Title: Day 8: 1:00 A.M. - 2:00 A.M.
Plot: As the terror threat continues, the Hassan family turmoil fans the flames of the increasingly urgent situation. When Jack closes in on a person of significant interest, a tense meeting between President Taylor and Omar Hassan takes an unexpected turn as the global security stakes are raised.
GuestStars: Kiefer Sutherland, Annie Wersching, Mary Lynn Rajskub
